articles.title: Air India: India begins downloading data from recorders of crashed Dreamliner - BBC
articles.description: The data from the recorders can be used to reconstruct the flight's final moments and determine the cause of the incident.
articles.content:
Cherylann Mollan
Investigators have recovered flight recorder data from the Air India crash earlier this month, the civil aviation ministry has confirmed, marking a key step in the probe.
At least … [+2723 chars]

articles.title: Tesla shake-up: Who is Omead Afshar? Senior executive reportedly fired by Elon Musk amid slumping sales i - Times of India
articles.description: International Business News: Omead Afshar, a key aide to Elon Musk and Tesla's VP of Manufacturing, is now out of job. This happened amidst Tesla facing sales challenges in North
